CROCUS(CRitique dOCUmentS) 音楽演奏講評データセットは: The CROCUS(CRitique dOCUmentS), a datset of music performance critique, is a open dataset for music education research. It contains 90 musical performances by 9 players and 239 critique documents written by 12 teachers.
データ収集にご協力いただいた協力者の皆様に深くお礼を申し上げます。: We'd like to thank to participants and collaborators in data collection.
プロを目指す楽器演奏者がどのような「ことば」で教育を受けているか、その質的な知は: The qualitative knowledge of what kind of 'words' is used in the musical performance tuition to become professionals is not widely shared. By analyzing and categorizing the words used by professional educators, we hope to identify the knowledge about the use of words in performance instruction.
今後の演奏に関連しない記載があると思いますか？: has no description not related to future performances?
今後の演奏に関連する記載が全て書かれていると思いますか？: is contains all the statements related to the future performances?
本プロジェクトはJST未来社会創造事業JPMJMI19G8「質的な知を客体化する: This project was supported by the JST MIRAI Grant Number JPMJMI19G8, 'Documentation Technology of Qualitative Knowledge in the Arts'.
松原正樹, 辻功, 平野剛, 香川璃奈: Masaki Matsubara, Isao Tsuji, Takeshi Hirano, and Rina Kagawa
演奏講評文書データベースの構築および講評文書の構造と効用の関係: Construction of Dataset of Musical Performance Critique (in Japanese)
記載されている内容から該当箇所を楽譜で参照できると思いますか？: allows you to refer to the relevant part in the score from the contents described?
記載されている内容は演奏を聴くことで検証できると思いますか？: can be verified by listening to the performance?
辻 功（洗足音楽大学，国立音楽大学）: Isao Tsuji (Senzoku Gakuen College of Music, Kunitachi College of Music)
